name: Jiu Jitsu
description: Every six years, an ancient order of jiu-jitsu fighters joins forces to battle a vicious race of alien invaders. But when a celebrated war hero goes down in defeat, the fate of the planet and mankind hangs in the balance.

review.author: sprobley
review.heading: Makes battlefield earth look like a masterpiece
review.reviewBody: This movie is so bad. It's no even one of those movies that is so bad it's funny...its just rubbish. I watched it to the end to see if it would get better, but it doesn't.

keywords: based on comic,martial arts,martial artist,alien,alien invasion
